msContents.summary: Homily by Marcellus of Ancyra written 350-374 in Ancyra, Galatia

objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 24x18 (24x20), 3 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 23-26 line(s) per column, 29-35 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: [1] Obtained by Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia) at Barcelona, España.
[2?] Obtained by Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia) at Barcelona, España.
[3?] Obtained by Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia) at Barcelona, España.
[4?] Obtained by Scuola Normale Superiore di Pisa (Scuola Normale of Pisa) at Pisa, Italia.

msIdentifier.msName: [1] P.PalauRib. Inv. 68 + 207, Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia), Barcelona, España.
[2?] P.PalauRib. Inv. 31, Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia), Barcelona, España.
[3?] P.PalauRib. Inv. 72, Arxiu Històric de la Companyia de Jesús a Catalunya (Archives of the Society of Jesus in Catalonia), Barcelona, España.
[4?] 4, Scuola Normale Superiore di Pisa (Scuola Normale of Pisa), Pisa, Italia.

sourceDesc.bibl: [1?] Sola, Francisco de P., “Texto patristico sobre la controversia cristologica”, Studia Papyrologica, vol. 9, p. 21-33, Barcelona, España, 1970. OCLC 2002610.
[2?] Sola, Francisco de P., “Texto patrístico del griego siglo IV (P. Palau Rib. inv. 72)”, Studia Papyrologica, vol. 7, p. 49-64, Barcelona, España, 1968. OCLC 2002610.

[3?] O'Callaghan, J., “Papyrus patristique”, Actes du XV Congrès International de Papyrologie II, (Papyrologica Bruxellensia 17), p. 42-48, Fondation égyptologique Reine Élisabeth: Bruxelles, België, 1979. OCLC 899037264.

[4?] Carlini, Antonio, Nuovi Papiri Letterari Fiorentini presentati al XIII. Intern. Papyrologenkongress Marburg/Lahn, 2-6 Agosto 1971, Editrice Tecnico Scientifica: Pisa, Italia, 1971. OCLC 879079247.
